## Overview

The EMSC Quarto Course Template is a comprehensive GitHub template for creating quantitative Earth and Marine Sciences courses with interactive web-based content. Developed by the Research School of Earth Sciences (RSES) at the Australian National University, this template combines modern web technologies to provide students with an engaging learning experience.

### Technology Stack

This template leverages:

- **[Quarto](https://quarto.org/)** - Scientific publishing system
- **[Pixi](https://prefix.dev/docs/pixi/overview)** - Fast, cross-platform package manager
- **[JupyterLite](https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io/)** - Jupyter running in the browser
- **[Pyodide](https://pyodide.org/)** - Python in WebAssembly
- **[Reveal.js](https://revealjs.com/)** - HTML presentation framework
- **GitHub Actions** - Automated builds and deployment

## Quick Start

### 1. Create Your Course Repository

Click the **"Use this template"** button on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/ANU-RSES-Education/EMSC-QuartoBook-Course) to create your own course.

### 2. Customize Your Course

- Update `WebBook/_quarto.yml` with your course details
- Add your content to `WebBook/`
- Create slides in `WebSlides/`

### 3. Build and Deploy

The template automatically builds and deploys to GitHub Pages when you push to the main branch.
